The curriculum covers various aspects, including mental health knowledge and soft skills. Leveraging the Social Emotional Learning (SEL) framework, All Walks aims to effectively enhance users' Social Emotional Competence (SEC) with skills to better regulate and manage social and emotions. Our products include mobile app, web tool and physical tools for learning and facilitation purposes. Our hybrid learning mode provides personalized digital journey that minimize manpower through systematic micro-learning, interactive exercises, and learning analytics. The performance tracking system facilitates early identification and prevention. https://www.allwalks.xyz - We are now seeking a developer to join us - What you should know about this position: 1. While we are a startup which tends to be more fast-paced, we value mental health so much that we have work-life-balance as a key team culture: 4-day work week with flexible working hours (i.e., you can do 7-3 instead) 2. Our team fully adopt hybrid working. You are allowed to work fully remote. 3. Given it is a 2025GBAYES position, you are required to live in Guangzhou at least starting from the 4th month of the employment. However, our incubator in Guangzhou provides free studio or highly subsidized one bedroom apartment (i.e., couple hundreds/ month) 4. Employment contract is signed with our Hong Kong company with possibility to return to work in Hong Kong after 15 months, if interested. 5. Free training on soft skills and other in-house materials you seem interested While we understand talents come in different shapes and forms, we hope you are/ have… 1. A reliable and trustable teammate to build, grow and scale our solution according to our discussed timeline 2. A self-motivated individual with growth mindset and passionate in innovation and creativity 3. Strong in communication, grit and resilience 4. Strong in problem solving and analytical skills 5. Aware of the general AI-assisting code trend to expedite your work without compromising the code quality 6. Interested in Game Design and Mental Health What you will do… 1. Work closely with clinical and research team to develop mental health related themes game designs with different instruction and interaction level 2. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code to implement game features and functionality 3. Conduct thorough testing to debug and optimize code to ensure high performance and seamless gaming experiences 4. Design, develop and enhance gameplay experiences in mainly 2D and AR projects built from Unity 5. Participate in occasion brainstorming sessions and contribute creative ideas to enhance game concepts 6. Contribute to database and API design 7. Support other R&D work (including, but not limited to project documents, technical reports, patent filing) We will also consider individuals with strong javascript and interested to work with C# unity too. It is a plus to us if you can 1. Independently develop and manage a project with full-stack capability and post-launch support 2. Familiar with hot update and Game Framework 3. Familiar with UI/UX design principles for developing engaging and intuitive user interfaces 4. Understanding, exposure or experience to server-side and cloud-based services Requirements 1. C# Unity and javascript (plus for node.js) 2. Knowledge of version control like Git and API At All Walks, we emphasize education and prevention through the help of technology and design. We welcome you to join to work with people from other disciplines to provide “shield” and empower individuals to live fruitfully! https://www.allwalks.xyz If you are interested, please feel free to send us your CV, portfolio and cover letter for consideration at iwantajob@allwalks.xyz

description: About the role As a Senior Programmer at Gold Label Technology Limited, you will play a crucial role in driving the development of innovative software solutions. This full-time position is based in the vibrant Kwun Tong District, where you will collaborate with a talented team to push the boundaries of what's possible in the world of Information & Communication Technology. What we're looking for 1-2 years of relevant working experience in Web application development and support. Degree, Diploma , Higher diploma or above in Computer Science or related discipline. Solid working experience in web-based application development and support. Work independent, proactive and strong problem solving. Good communication and analytical skill. Good command of spoken English and Cantonese. Tech Skills Required: HTML5, CSS Python (With Framework like: Django) or Java (With Android Development) or Typescript / JavaScript (With Framework like: Vue3 or React) SQL (RDBMS, like MySQL, MariaDB Tech Skills (Less Important): Typescript / JavaScript / Node.js (With Framework like: Nuxt.js or Next.js or Nest.js or Express.js ) Experience on NoSQL (Redis / MongoDB) Experience on ORM or Experience on writing Middleware Experience on Authentication (JWT) & Role authentication & Cookies Manage Experience on Windows Server and IIS Experience on Linux Server with Nginx Experience on Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing Experience on debugging, sych as Unit Test / System Test Experience on version control: Git, GitHub, or CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions) Experience on using AI Tools such as Github Copilot / Cline / Cursor Proficiency in C#, PHP, Java, JavaScript, React, Android App development Knowledge on router, LAN & WAN switching Nice to have experience in SharePoint and familiar in Microsoft products What we offer At Gold Label Technology Limited, we are committed to providing our employees with a rewarding and fulfilling work experience. We offer competitive salaries, generous leave entitlements, and a range of professional development opportunities to help you grow and thrive within the organisation. Our modern office space and collaborative culture foster an environment where creativity, innovation, and teamwork are celebrated. About us About Gold Label Technology Ltd. Founded in 2006, Gold Label initially focused on labeling and hardware sales. We began as a label factory in Shenzhen, China, and quickly expanded our offerings to include labels, ribbons, and Auto-ID products through exhibition campaigns and direct sales. Our website features products from leading manufacturers like Zebra, Honeywell, and TSC. As a strategic partner of Zebra and Honeywell, we provide expertise that delivers significant benefits to customers needing a comprehensive solution (hardware, software, and consumables) to streamline their operations. Over the past nineteen years, we have developed tailored software solutions, building a reputation for blending technical proficiency with enthusiasm to meet diverse business needs. Whether your business requires an RFID solution, an inventory system, or simply labels and ribbons, we are confident in our ability to exceed your expectations. Our services extend beyond hardware; we adopt a flexible approach and prioritize listening to your requirements. This enables us to offer the best solutions at any time. Starting with a team of just ten, our factory in China initially supplied a variety of labels. Today, after nineteen years of growth, we have become a leading provider of RFID labels, tags, and solutions in China and Hong Kong, serving small, medium, and large businesses, as well as governmental and manufacturing sectors worldwide. While many see Gold Label as primarily a hardware provider, we also excel in software and consumables. Effective hardware requires reliable software and high-quality consumables to maximize its potential. When these elements work in harmony, businesses operate better, faster, and smarter. Apply now to join our dynamic team and be a part of the exciting journey at Gold Label Technology Limited.
